channel.title: Does Anyone Besides Me Still Play TES IV: OBLIVION?
channel.description: HI, i was wondering if anyone other than me and my closest friends still play oblivion at least 2 times a month

item.title: Does Anyone Besides Me Still Play TES IV: OBLIVION?
item.dc:creator: @Aetoc Aetoc
item.description:
@Aetoc wrote:

[quote=“Docent, post:3, topic:525261”][quote author=Aetoc link=topic=644004.msg4334490#msg4334490 date=1374132006]
I do i have the GOTY edition.
[/quote]

Haha Xbox or Playstation? I have GOTY too but I dont have live so I cant use the DLC =[[/quote]

Playstation 3.

Read full topic

item.title: Does Anyone Besides Me Still Play TES IV: OBLIVION?
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

I’ve been wanting to play it again for a while but I can’t find it anywhere. I think my brother traded it to his friend for Left 4 Dead, but he won’t tell me.

item.title: Does Anyone Besides Me Still Play TES IV: OBLIVION?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

I still play it once in a while, I’ve mostly stuck to Skyrim though because the way leveling works in Oblivion is just ass.

item.title: Does Anyone Besides Me Still Play TES IV: OBLIVION?
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:

I used to play the same games over and over again, but I just can’t find the patience or will to do it anymore.
